name: Dehoarder
description:
Special Announcement

Dehoarder 2 is in active development. In order to continue with my development plans, I need your support. Please Wishlist/Follow Dehoarder 2 on Steam today!

Enjoy my back catalog of free games (pay what you want, no third party ads, no in-app purchases). If you have fun with any of them, please consider supporting me on Patreon. ALL Patrons get access to my Daily Standup blog, and Beta Cat level or higher Patrons will get automatic access to the earliest alpha playtest releases of Dehoarder 2.

Thank you for your support.

Clean Up Your Act

Ludum Dare 26 Compo Entry - #118 in Humor Category, #127 in Innovation Category (Jam Theme: Minimalism)

Minimalize your lifestyle by reducing your hoard to a managable size. At first, your efforts will be resisted. However, as you earn willpower, you will be able to dispose of more junk.

Special events may occur that present opportunities and/or cost money. Get some outside help from a cleaning service, help a neighborhood kid with a project, or face the wallet-slimming wrath of the city building inspector.

This was my Ludum Dare 26 Compo entry. This game and everything in it (except the logo screen) were made within 48 hours during the Ludum Dare competetion that ran on April 26-29, 2013.

The game scored very well in the Humor and Innovation categories, nearly cracking the top 100, and well above the 90th percentile. I think this was a very strong showing for my first Ludum Dare entry.

Ludum Dare 26 Rankings for this game:

  • Humor 3.29 (118th)
  • Innovation 3.76 (127th)
  • Graphics 3.58 (238th)
  • Mood 3.19 (309th)
  • Overall 3.42 (316th)
  • Theme 3.62 (457th)
  • Audio 2.80 (492nd)
  • Fun 2.84 (676th)

Provided as-is and without warranty; all new development is being done on Dehoarder 2.
